io_raw_de:
• Output Jack (Headphones/Amp): Zout 100 Ω, 2.0 V RMS max
• DC In: 7.5 V (AC adaptor jack)
• Built‑in speakers
controls_raw_de:
Tone select (2‑digit)
• Rhythm/Pattern select
• Tempo
• Volume
• Super Accompaniment
• 5 Percussion Pads
power_raw_de:
DC: 5× AA (SUM‑3/R6P), Batterielaufzeit ca. 6 h
• AC‑Adapter: Casio AD‑1 (optional), DC 7.5 V
• Leistungsaufnahme: 1.6 W
notes_raw_de:
100 Tones
• 4‑Note Polyphony
• 19 Auto‑Rhythms + 13 Super Accompaniment Patterns
• Demo Songs: 5
• Lautsprecher: 0.5 W + 0.5 W
• Maße/Gewicht: 612×176×61 mm, 1.2 kg
Quelle: https://arch.casio-intl.com/asia-mea/en/emi/past/mini/sa21.html ; https://analogrelics.wordpress.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/12/casio-sa-21-manual.pdf
